definition: suffix of a noun of locality

pinyin: Zhong1 E2 bian1 jie4 xie2 yi4

sentences.english: In the beginning the quarries lay far beyond the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 起初採石場還遠離城市的邊界。

sentences.english: A simple hierarchical coarse-to-fine edge detection method based on the direction of potential edge elements is given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於邊界點方向的新的邊界檢測方法。

sentences.english: A simple hierarchical coarse-to-fine edge detection method based on the direction of potential edge elements is given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於邊界點方向的新的邊界檢測方法。

sentences.english: Making use of the expression of the image-force, we analyze the interaction of the dislocation with the interface and the boundary.
sentences.chinese: 通過像力公式可以分析自由邊界和界面對位錯的作用。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the scattering problem with non-smooth boundary.
sentences.chinese: 討論了一類具有非光滑邊界的散射體的散射問題。

sentences.english: Similarly, state and county boundaries can be represented with polygons.
sentences.chinese: 類似地，州和國家邊界可以用多邊形表示。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the report also found the American border to be atr isk.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，報告同時發現，美國邊界亦岌岌可危。

sentences.english: So an ABR by definition is a member of two or more areas.
sentences.chinese: 區域邊界路由器是兩個或者多個區域的成員。

sentences.english: Margins define the outside boundary of your page.
sentences.chinese: 邊距決定頁面的外部邊界。

sentences.english: The name for this border between lunar night and day is the terminator line.
sentences.chinese: 我們把月亮上的黑白邊界線叫做‘晨昏線’。

sentences.english: Chinese leaders that Russia will fulfil the Sino-Russian border agreement faithfully.
sentences.chinese: 中國領導人說，俄羅斯將履行中俄邊界協議的回信。

sentences.english: Rajin-Sonbong (or Rason, for short) lies by the Sea of Japan in the country’s north-east, near the border with Russia.
sentences.chinese: 羅津靠近日本海，在北韓的東北部，接近俄國邊界。

sentences.english: The border styles make it easy to see the results of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 邊界樣式的使用使查看錦標賽的結果非常容易。

sentences.english: On the east, your southern boundary will start from the end of the Salt Sea
sentences.chinese: 南角要從尋的曠野，貼着以東的邊界。

sentences.english: Describes a method to detect the edge of omnidirectional M-mode echocardiography images.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種全方向M型心動圖的邊界提取方法。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents the word-end boundary assertion.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於判斷單詞結束邊界的字符。

definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
